From: Jessie Webster, To: Bess Chandler Mailed From: Pleasantville, Illinois on April 15, 1911

Miss Bess Chandler Pearl, Illinois

Dear Bess; How have you been getting along? I guess you got through all right. It is too bad Leta failed on grammar. You and Opal had better come over when Leta comes. I got through all right. Lovingly, Jessie Webster
